scripts.all: npm run main:all & npm run direct:all
scripts.all:min: npm run main-min & npm run direct-min
scripts.main:all: npm run main:browserify & npm run main:browserify-rollup & npm run main:jspm & npm run main:webpack
scripts.main:browserify: mkdirp dist/main && browserify src_main/index.js -o dist/main/bundle-browserify.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.main:browserify-rollup: mkdirp dist/main && browserify src_main/index.js -o dist/main/bundle-browserify-rollup.js -t [ rollupify --config rollup.config.direct.js ]
scripts.main:jspm: mkdirp dist/main && jspm bundle src_main/index.js dist/main/bundle-jspm.js --skip-source-maps
scripts.direct:all: npm run direct:browserify & npm run direct:browserify-rollup & npm run direct:jspm & npm run direct:rollup & npm run direct:webpack
scripts.direct:browserify: mkdirp dist/direct && browserify src_direct/index.js -o dist/direct/bundle-browserify.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.direct:browserify-rollup: mkdirp dist/direct && browserify src_direct/index.js -o dist/direct/bundle-browserify-rollup.js -t [ rollupify --config rollup.config.direct.js ]
scripts.direct:jspm: mkdirp dist/direct && jspm bundle src_direct/index.js dist/direct/bundle-jspm.js --skip-source-maps
scripts.main-min: mkdirp dist/main-min && npm run main-min:browserify & npm run main-min:browserify-rollup & npm run main-min:jspm & npm run main-min:webpack
scripts.direct-min: mkdirp dist/direct-min && npm run direct-min:browserify & npm run direct-min:browserify-rollup & npm run direct-min:jspm & npm run direct-min:webpack
